headline: The Best Stocks to Invest $50,000 in Right Now
summary: Meta has a wide moat in social media and digital advertising and a track record of steady growth.  Axon has built a unique business in law enforcement technology.  Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META) may be the best example of a business that can burn through billions in cash on a side project, but is still overwhelmingly successful.
